entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • GeneratedRegex Attribute Failed to generate code and shows CS8795 error #79367
  • createdump fails to collect actionable dumps on macOS 13 Ventura #79355
    7.0.x
  • AutoMapper crashes on .NET 6 iOS MAUI application mapping IEnumerable properties #79354
    7.0.x
  • CultureInfo("nb-NO") not working correctly for iOS on .NET 7 #79347
    7.0.x
  • Are there any side effects about the warnings? #79344
  • [API Proposal]: Allow disabling cache for RSAKey class #79338
  • File.OpenHandle() limitations #79335
  • TimeSpan - Microseconds and Nanoseconds #79333
  • BadImageFormatException when invoking static abstract method through reflection #79331
    8.0.0
  • Crash in coreclr!WKS::gc_heap::make_unused_array #79327
    8.0.0
  • Crash in coreclr!ILCodeVersion::GetActiveNativeCodeVersion #79326
    8.0.0
  • Test failure readytorun/coreroot_determinism/coreroot_determinism/coreroot_determinism.sh #79320
  • Native AOT Testing in .NET 8 #79316
    8.0.0

Closed

  • Question for Service Release of Net 7 #79359
  • IndexOutOfRangeException when using compiled and ignorecase regex in .NET 7.0 #79298
    8.0.0
  • AsnEncodedData.Format return empty for CRL extension in Linux #79265
  • RSA.VerifyData terminates with "Out of memory." on Linux when passing an all-zero modulus #78293
  • [wasm] `Blazor scenarios` broken on `dotnet-runtime-perf` #79330
    8.0.0
  • RegexOptions.NonBacktracking missing matches with certain alternations involving non-nullable prefixes #79110
    8.0.0
  • Unloading NativeAOT compiled dll? #79348
  • [wasm] V8 crash with AOT for `System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript.Tests` #78972
    8.0.0
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 4 Regressions on 10/14/2022 7:48:13 PM #78810
  • Bounds checks not removed in several cases #37167
    Future
  • Devirtualization issues in non-shared generics #37717
    Future
  • JIT should propagate assertions and elide custom (bounds) checks #44040
    Future
  • What exactly is the managed calling convention? #54796
    Future
  • Improve codegen for delegate cast / type check? #55841
    Future
  • Unrolled Vector128<T>.Count doesn't elide bounds check #61207
    8.0.0
  • Is there a way to tell SSLStreams to validate the remote certificate based on the certificate present in path rather than Windows keystore? #79266
    Future
  • Upper bound effect on unsafe indexing #61498
    Future
  • Test failure JIT/Regression/JitBlue/Runtime_76194/Runtime_76194/Runtime_76194.sh #79319
  • Logger name allocations from ILoggerFactory.CreateLogger<MyClass>() #79317
    Future
  • iOS & tvOS legs are failing to AOT System.Net.Http.Json #79279
  • Test failure tracing\\eventpipe\\bigevent\\bigevent\\bigevent.cmd #78001
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix BN_is_zero for OpenSSL 1.0.2 non-portable build #79369
    area-System.Security
  • Fix Sse3 => Ssse3 typo #79368
    area-System.Memory, 8.0.0
  • Delete parts of type system that deal with layouts #79366
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Fix dump creation on MacOS Ventura #79365
    Servicing-consider, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 7.0.x
  • Add experimental Regex test based on SampleMatches #79364
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Ensure that `TryGetContainableHWIntrinsicOp` is non-mutating #79363
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix declaration of local in regex source generator #79362
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • [release/7.0] Fix handling of backtracking stack with some loops #79361
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • [release/7.0] Fix dump creation on MacOS Ventura #79360
    Servicing-consider, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 7.0.x
  • [release/7.0] [wasm] fix marshaling Error to C# as JSType.Any #79352
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.x
  • [release/7.0] [wasm] Catch error from loading "node:crypto" module #79351
    Servicing-consider, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.x
  • Don't embed bitcode on tvOS anymore #79349
    area-Build-mono, community-contribution
  • JIT: experiment with early liveness and use it for forward sub and last-use copy elision #79346
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • * Registry.GetSubKeyNames : Remove List copy to Array #79345
    area-Microsoft.Win32, community-contribution
  • [mono][interp] Remove some dead opcodes #79343
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • JIT: Allow cloning addresses even before initobj #79341
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][aot] Optimize constrained calls made from gsharedvt methods. #79339
  • Allow Base64Decoder to ignore space chars, add IsValid methods and tests #79334
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • improve SslStream exception after disposal #79329
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Wasm jiterpreter cleanup and bug fixes pt. 4 #79324
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • improve symlink handling in Ping #79323
    area-System.Net
  • Test ldp/stp optimization #79318
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • Handle zero value modulus for OpenSSL 1.1 #79013
    area-System.Security
  • Fix dump creation on MacOS Ventura #79356
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Ignoring test regression runtime_63354 in x86 #79358
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use static sealed vtable for dynamically created types #79332
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Use IndexOfAnyExceptInRange in ZipHelper.GetEncoding #79357
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • Fix handling of backtracking stack with some loops #79353
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 8.0.0
  • Call BIO_gets in a loop until no more data can be read #79300
    area-System.Security
  • Fix a NonBacktracking subsumption checking rule for XY|X??Y #79163
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Compile native code with `-ffunction-sections` #79322
    area-Infrastructure
  • [wasm] fix marshaling Error to C# as JSType.Any #79340
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [Android] Fix path to `ping` on Android API 21-27 #79076
    area-System.Net, os-android
  • [mono] Convert Array icalls to use ObjectHandleOnStack. #77343
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [mono][aot] Fix infinite recursion in the AOT dwarf emitter. #79310
  • Simplify MethodCell #79321
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Only allocate StringBuilder for complex type names #79325
    community-contribution
  • [mono][interp] Replace ldobj.vt + stobj.vt.noref pair with cpobj.vt.noref #79302
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [JIT] X64 - Allow containment of larger memory operands for `AND`, `OR`, `XOR` #79126
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix test by actually passing the message and exception. #79307
    area-System.Diagnostics, community-contribution
  • CoreCLR initialization failures logging #78790
    area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0

Updated

  • fix determin lib name varation logic #79370
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Don't use IlcPath in NativeAOT targets #79233
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • New ASCII APIs #75012
    area-System.Buffers, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Enable the fundamentals behind libraries tests compiled via crossgen2 #75230
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/6.0] Workaround MacCatalyst .app output path change in cmake 3.25 #79098
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [release/7.0] Workaround MacCatalyst .app output path change in cmake 3.25 #79097
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Add MemoryExtensions.Split #79048
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Remove span pinning associated with string.Create #78914
  • Use IndexOfAnyValues in the RegexCompiler and source gen #78927
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 8.0.0
  • Implement unmanaged-to-managed direction for vtable stub generator #77130
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • [Merge-on-Red] - Implement Test Process Watcher #78742
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Fixing assert on variable live range for simd12 LCL / STORE_LCL #79182
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix HTTP3 header decoder buffer allocation #78862
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0][wasm] Add RollForward=Major for WasmAppHost . #79315
    Servicing-consider, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 7.0.x
  • Experiment with changing the implementation strategy for RangeListMap #79021
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Stop producing and handling `ADDR` nodes #78246
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm][debugger] Revert don't need to escape special characters anymore #78320
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Implement DivRem intrinsic for X86 #66551
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Lazy init of [JSExport] bindings #77293
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • CallSiteRuntimeResolver. VisitFactory method implements adding IsInstanceOfType check #79232
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Fix perf. regression caused by signed/unsigned comp #79137
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Split library and package Readme #78888
    area-Meta, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [Android] Improvements to remote certificate verification in SslStream #77386
    area-System.Net.Security, os-android, 8.0.0
  • [draft][wasm] Memory snapshot #78915
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • [wasm][debugger] Removing console.debug message helper to make debugger work. #72812
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 8.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Enable smoke tests on macOS #76560
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Replace successive "ldr" and "str" instructions with "ldp" and "stp" #77540
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • WIP: Create AND chains in bool optimizer pass #79283
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [draft][wasi] compile with libs.native #79046
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0] [wasm] Add warning code to all warnings produced in WasmAppBuilder #79234
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 7.0.3
  • [WIP] Cloning files on OSX-like platforms when possible instead of copying the whole file #79243
    area-System.IO, os-mac-os-x, community-contribution
  • Fix thread-safety issues with enumerating ResourceManager. #75054
    area-System.Resources, community-contribution
  • [JIT] X64/ARM64 - `CAST` removals for small types on `ADD`, `SUB`, `MUL`, `AND`, `OR`, `XOR`, `NOT`, `NEG` #77874
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Mono musl support #76500
    area-Infrastructure-mono, community-contribution
  • Do not override content root with default #79242
    area-Extensions-Hosting
  • SP800-108 CTR HMAC #79120
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • A gentle reminder that TraceGC is turned off #79183
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Move the rearrange_uoh_segments call earlier so that distribute_free_regions can take them into account #79262
    area-GC-coreclr
